sense.def:
Clothes
so predmeti, ki jih ljudje oblačijo, na primer srajce, plašči, hlače, obleke ali spodnje perilo.

seg.quote: I took off all my clothes.
They hadn't got any clothes on.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
clothed in something
, je v nekaj oblečen.

seg.quote: Mrs Travers was clothed in green.

sense.def:
To clothe someone
pomeni nekomu priskrbeti oblačila.

seg.quote: Are we not better fed, better clothed, and better housed than ever before?
